description.narrative: Malawi - Power Project: This project will improve the availability, reliability, and quality of the power supply by increasing the throughput capacity and stability of the national electricity grid and increasing efficiency of hydropower generation through investments in infrastructure development.

title.narrative: Improving Power Quality and Reliability in Malawi
Malawi STAR Report: Full Program Lifecycle Report

condition.narrative: Further details on conditions precedent affecting this activity can be found in the top-level parent activities.

description.narrative: Cumulative Output of Generation capacity added, measured in megawatts, resulting from construction of new generating capacity or reconstruction, rehabilitation, or upgrading of existing generating capacity funded with MCC support.
